Jonathan Minecraft was a character on the official ''Minecraft'' [[YouTube]] channel. He was a minor character in [[How We Make Minecraft]], gradually having a larger role until he became the main antagonist of [[Around the Minecraft World in 80 Biomes]] along with [[Mobbo]]. He is also allegedly the full name of ''Minecraft''.

== Appearance ==
Jonathan Minecraft slightly resembles [[Narrator (YouTube)|Narrator]], who has several items from the [[Character Creator]], including the "Short Slick" and the old "Tired-Brows" however with darker hair. Unlike Narrator, he uses the default player model rather than the slim one. His dark tuxedo has a pink area above his neck.

== Biography ==
Sometime in the past, Jonathan Minecraft allegedly married [[Narrator (YouTube)|Narrator]] and broke up with him. Eventually, he was hired by Mojang Studios, but was briefly fired because his ideas were simply too good. Enraged, he seeked his revenge, including breaking into [[Mobbo]] and his ex-husband's wedding.<ref>{{Citation|url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zj7oviDVEh4|title=Ending Minecraft: How We Make Minecraft|website=YouTube}}</ref> At an unknown point, he acquired the [[Minefinity Gauntlet]]. He then leaked his plans for Minecraft in an [[ancient city]], which Narrator read but was killed by a [[warden]] by the orders of Mobbo. Jonathan then went to the feature addition machine in Mojang's secret headquarters. However, Narrator was revived, where he brought [[M.A.R.I.L.L.A.]] and chased Jonathan to the machine. However, he and Mobbo entered Minecraft first. Jonathan had also acquired [[Mega-Mobbo]] at some point. At the end, however, Mobbo betrayed Jonathan Minecraft and sacrificed themself to drown him in lava, seemingly killing him and Mobbo forever.

== Personality ==
Jonathan Minecraft's goal is to "replace Minecraft with [his] perfect image."<ref>{{Citation|url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4ZsbkMrSeq0|title=MONSTERS OF MINECRAFT: Episode 4|website=YouTube}}</ref> His traits resemble a stereotypical villain, like angrily yelling at a failed plan.<ref>{{Citation|url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YRPlscod34Y|title=WOODLAND MANSION MYSTERY: Episode 3|website=YouTube}}</ref>

== Trivia ==
*Jonathan Minecraft was Narrator's 3rd most "toxic ex," while Narrator is Jonathan Minecraft's 4th most "toxic ex."<ref>{{Citation|url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GW2l7X7wdtw|title=THE END OF MINECRAFT: Episode 5|website=YouTube}}</ref>
*Jonathan Minecraft is American.{{citation needed}}
*Jonathan Minecraft was the Mojang Studios "coffee boy" before Narrator took his position in the [[How We Make Minecraft#Series 2|second series of How We Make Minecraft]].<ref>{{Citation|url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4ZsbkMrSeq0|title=MONSTERS OF MINECRAFT: Episode 4|website=YouTube}}</ref>
*Jonathan Minecraft likes [[Suspicious Stew|suspicious stew]] so much, he has been in a bathroom due to overdose.<ref>{{Citation|url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JhgN2FVENSE|title=DESERT OF DOOM: Episode 2|website=YouTube}}</ref>
